skill.name: bite
skill.attackDescription: #userNameCapital# scratches #targetName# with its claws dealing #damage# damage
skill.missDescription: #userNameCapital# scratches at #targetName# with its claws but misses
skill.playerAttackDescription: You scratch #targetName# with your claws and deal #damage#
skill.playerMissDescription: You scratch at #targetName# with your claws butmiss.
